title: PC firm earns zero economic profit in LR

content.question: Which of the following statements is true about a firm that sells its output in a perfectly competitive market?

choices.label: The demand for its product is a downward-sloping function.
The firm will earn zero economic profits in long-run equilibrium.
Advertising is an important tool of the firm.
The firm will increase its total economic profits if it charges a price that is lower than the market price.
The marginal revenue that firm receives from selling an additional unit of output will be different from the price at which it sells that unit.

content.answer: The firm will earn zero economic profits in long-run equilibrium.
